name: TopHatJump
description:
Hi, I'm a 14 year old game dev and this is my second game, I spent  a lot of time working on it, it is a platformer with a simplistic art style, it took me 2 weeks to make, and I am very proud of it.

In it you play as a little ball, which wants a top hat, and he goes through an entire adventure to get his top hat, from mountains to dangerous cities, he will get his top hat!

The game is available to play in the web(IF YOU PLAY IT ON THE WEB, PLAY IT IN FULLSCREEN TO AVOID BUGS), and it is also available on Mac, Windows and Linux, to get the best experience download it on your computer.

All art was made by me using pixilart or unity itself, the only thing I did not make myself was a couple of scripts and the music which was ade by:  https://www.youtube.com/c/FineSound

PLEASE LEAVE FEEDBACK AFTER PLAYING IN THE COMMENTS
